title: Impact of deflation on nominal, real output

content.question: If nominal gross domestic product fell while real gross domestic product rose, which of the following must be true?

choices.label: The average of stock prices rose while bond prices fell.
Nominal interest rates rose by less than the rate of inflation.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
